name: Beasty Karts
description:
Race! Chase! Smash! Crash! Crossing the finish line has never been so satisfying!

Race and defeat the competition in over twelve challenging race tracks. Show off your uniqueness with an assortment of stylish karts and skins to choose from. Upgrade your weapons and stop your foes in their tracks.

Beat your previous time and hone your racing skills.

All that stands between you and the finish line is your opponent…..and….some missiles….and…. a few bombs…and…. a bunch of mines. But you got this!

• Over 12 challenging race tracks.
• Fully upgradeable weapons!
• Choose from more than 30 kart and skin combinations!
• Endless replay-ability."
